Pumps Installation & Manifold Upgradation at Shell LOBP, Karachi

Fabrication, Installation, Testing & Commissioning of Oil Transfer Pumps. The project’s scope of work includes the following activities:

  • Dismantling of Redundant Pipelines
  • Development of Pump Civil Foundations
  • Installation of 05 x New Pumps with Associated Piping
  • Supply, Installation & Commissioning of Pump starters & Electrical panels

Supply, Fabrication, Installation, Testing & Commissioning of Manifold Area Pipelines. The project’s scope of work includes the following activities:

  • Design Validation as per Ergonomic Standards
  • Material Procurement
  • Dismantling of existing Manifold
  • Supply & Installation of 60 x Valves
  • Installation of 100 x Dry Break Couplings
  • Blasting & Painting
  • Cleaning & Hydrotesting

Completion Date: October 20, 2020

 

Replacement of Steam Condensate Return System at Shell LOBP, Karachi

Supply, Fabrication, Installation, and Commissioning of Steam Condensate piping at Shell Lubricant Oil Blending Plant to enhance condensate recovery. Scope of work included the following activities:

  • Development of Civil Foundations & Field Supports
  • Validation of Piping Design
  • Material Procurement
  • Mobilization to site
  • Dismantling of Redundant Pipelines
  • Blasting & Painting
  • Cleaning & Hydrotesting
  • Insulation & Cladding works

The project also involved the use of Cranes, Lifting Gear, Lifting Appliances and the Development of Isometric Drawings.

Completion Date: July 7, 2020

 

Mangla Refurbishment Project – Package II – Powerhouse Cranes Refurbishment

A Joint venture with ISIK – Petrocon and Zirva (Pvt) Ltd. for the Mangla Dam Refurbishment Project. Powerhouse Refurbishment includes two Overhead Cranes (200-ton Capacity) and one Gantry Crane (25-ton Capacity) at Mangla Power Station. Scope of work included

  • Complete replacement of Electrical Systems
  • Non-Destructive Examination
  • Painting
  • Replacement of Wire Ropes
  • Replacement of Hooks
  • Replacement of Motors

Completion Date: November 13, 2017

 

Design, Supply, Testing, Erection, and Commissioning of New Hoisting System for Spillway Gates, Warsak Power Station, Warsak

“A Joint Venture between M/S ISIK Muhendislik (Turkey), M/S Zirva (Pvt) Ltd. and M/S Petrocon Engineering (Pvt) Ltd. for the Design, Supply Testing and Commissioning of New Hoisting System for Spillway Gates at Warsak Power Station. Expected Date of Completion: June 2017”

Completion Date: April 24, 2017

 

Steel Super Structure Railway Bridge at Marrir Chowk, Rawalpindi

“Supply, Fabrication, Testing, Erection and Commissioning of Rivetted Steel Super Structure Railway Bridge using Semi Through Plate Girders, R.S Joist, Channels, Angles, Gusset Plates, Stiffeners etc duly Sandblasted and Painted with Two Coats of Red Oxide Primer and Two Coats of Red Oxide Gloss Enamel”

Completion Date: April 30, 2014

 

Assembly, Installation & Commissioning of 14 x EOT Cranes at Karachi Shipyard & Engineering Works, Karachi

Assembly, Installation, and Commissioning of 14 x Electrical Overhead Travelling Cranes at KS&EW. The project’s scope of work includes the following activities:

  • Unloading of Crane Components
  • Pre-Assembly of Main Girders & End Girders
  • Launching of Cranes on Crane Rails
  • Erection of Bridge Trolley, Electrical Rooms & Operator Cabins
  • Installation of Busbars
  • Installations of Electrical Wiring & Function Trials
  • Static & Dynamic Load Test
  • Commissioning and Handover

Crane Capacities: 04 x 100 Tons, 03 x 32 Tons, 03 x 30 Tons, 02 x 5 Tons, 01 x 3 Tons & 01 x 02 Tons.

Completion Date: January 1, 2022

 

Miscellaneous Maintenance Works at Shell LOBP, Karachi

Maintenance Works:

  • Staircase Modification Works
  • Construction of Sheds
  • Temporary Ramps & Access Platforms
  • Misc. Foundation Works
  • Repair of Warehouse Gates
  • Repair of Fire Fighting System
  • Installation of Fire Monitors
  • Displacing of Softener Cylinders
  • Repair of Valley Gutters & Drop Spouts
  • Misc. Scaffolding & Erection Works etc.

Completion Date: March 1, 2022

 

Supply and Fabrication of Diversion Tunnel Lining Form

Manufacturing of Diversion Tunnel Lining Form referred to as lining form as per the design and technical details provided by KyungDong within the required time period. Scope of work contains Supply, Fabrication, and Erection of Lining form.

Completion Date: January 25, 2013

 

Sound Proof Steel Sliding Door

“Supply, Fabrication, Erection and Commissioning of Fire Retardant, Sound Proof Steel Sliding Door complete with Top and Bottom Track duly riveted / screwed complete with MS Perforated Sheet on One Side, Rockwool Filling for Sound Proofing wrapped in Fire Retardant Cloth duly Painted”

Completion Date: November 1, 2014

 

Fabrication of Heat Exchangers and Pressure Vessels for CNG Compressor Including Pulsation Damper and High Pressure Piping

“This project is part of a joint venture between Petrocon Engineering and Hypercomp, to manufacture CNG compressors locally. Petrocon Engineering is responsible for fabrication of Heat Exchangers, Pressure vessels, Inlet/Blowdown Chambers, Pulsation Dampers and High Pressure piping of the compressors.”

Completion Date: November 15, 2011

 

Supply and Installation of Solar Water Heaters and Installation of solar P.V. Panels

“Supply, Fabrication, Erection and Commissioning of Fire Retardant, Sound Proof Steel Sliding Door complete with Top and Bottom Track duly riveted / screwed complete with MS Perforated Sheet on One Side, Rockwool Filling for Sound Proofing wrapped in Fire Retardant Cloth duly Painted”

Completion Date: August 1, 2010

 

Fabrication and Supply of Fuel Storage Tanks

“This project included cutting of plates to required dimensions, rolling to required curvature, fabrication of shells/tanks/end plates, bending of angle iron for internal reinforcement, welding of tanks as per API 650, Dye Penetration Testing of welding, Pressure testing up to 7 psi, sand blasting internally/externally & epoxy coating fuel resistant internally and coal tar epoxy externally for bury”

Completion Date: May 1, 2010

 

Supply and Fabrication of Fuel Storage Tanks

“This project was done for a joint venture of Louis Berger Group and Black and veatch for a 100 MW power plant in Kabul. The Steel structures were fabricated/manufactured in Islamabad and then transported to Kabul for Installation.”

Completion Date: December 31, 2009

 

Installation and Commissioning of 1500 Solar Homes in Tharparker, Sindh

This was a project under the Roshan Pakistan Scheme. This project was aimed at providing access to electric lighting and means of communication to the rural population.

Completion Date: June 12, 2007

 

Supply and Fabrication of Fuel Oil Storage Tank

“It was a 2000 gallons capacity diesel storage tank for WHO project at Islamabad duly tested, sand blasted and epoxy coated suitable for under ground installation. ”

Completion Date: October 12, 2005

 

Supply of Diesel Fuel Storage Tank

“These were made for Perini Mangement Services Incorporated and supplied to their installation in Kabul. It was a6000 gallons fuel storage tank in accordance with API 650 complete in all respect dully pressure tested, sandblasted, epoxy coated. Supply includes the Access Platform, Ladder and Guard Railing etc. ”

Completion Date: November 28, 2005

 

Light Fixing Panels for Badminton Courts & Gymnasium Building, Islamabad Club

“Supply, Fabrication and Installation of Steel Structure for Light Fixing Panels (Single / Double) Duly Shaped to Required Curvatures. Fabricated from MS Pipe MS Perforated Sheet and MS Plate, Painted with One Coat of Red Oxide Primer and Industrial Synthetic Enamel”

Completion Date: September 9, 2012

 

Manufacturing of Portable Food Grade Ice Plants

“A Joit Venture between M/S Petrocon Engineering (Pvt) Ltd. and M/S Hypercomp (Pvt) Ltd. for Manufacturing of Portable Ice Plants ranging from 01 Ton – 20 Ton per day capacity using Food Grade Stainless Steel Cans with Block Sizes ranging from 5kg – 50kg. Know More: http://www.hypertech.com.pk/ ”

Completion Date: June 15, 2021
